name: Heaven's Tower
description:
Description:

Work in progress!

Heaven's Tower is a dungeon crawler game, where the goal is for the player to reach the top of a mystical tower in order to discover the mysteries of its origins.

- 2D isometric view

- Action Adventure Fantasy Genre 

- Deck-based Combat System in real time

Game made by:

Adi Khanna - Level & Narrative Designer

Eric Urazbakhtin - Artist

Christian Pamaong - Designer & Programmer

Ken Ge - Programmer Prime

Xin Zhang - Producer

Updates since creation (Dec 12):

[Dec 14]

+Player starts with 1 Max Mana, down from 5.

+Added Mana Ramping (Player gains Max Mana when clearing new Rooms, up to a cap)

+Tweaked enemies a bit.
